pullRequest.body:
Define compactly generated topological spaces, which are spaces whose topology is coinduced by continuous maps whose domain is compact Hausdorff.
Prove basic properties and instances.
Provide instances for sequential spaces and Hausdorff weakly locally compact spaces.

---
<!-- The text above the `---` will become the commit message when your
PR is merged. Please leave a blank newline before the `---`, otherwise
GitHub will format the text above it as a title.

For details on the "pull request lifecycle" in mathlib, please see:
https://leanprover-community.github.io/contribute/index.html

In particular, note that most reviewers will only notice your PR
if it passes the continuous integration checks.
Please ask for help on https://leanprover.zulipchat.com if needed.

To indicate co-authors, include lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Co-authored-by: Author Name <author@email.com>

If you are moving or deleting declarations, please include these lines at the bottom of the commit message
(that is, before the `---`) using the following format:

Moves:
- Vector.* -> Mathlib.Vector.*
- ...

Deletions:
- Nat.bit1_add_bit1
- ...

Any other comments you want to keep out of the PR commit should go
below the `---`, and placed outside this HTML comment, or else they
will be invisible to reviewers.

If this PR depends on other PRs, please list them below this comment,
using the following format:
- [ ] depends on: #abc [optional extra text]
- [ ] depends on: #xyz [optional extra text]

-->

- [x] depends on: #15201
- [x] depends on: #15202
- [x] depends on: #15176

<details><summary>

#### Import changes for modified files

</summary>

Dependency changes

| File | Base Count | Head Count | Change |
| --- | --- | --- | --- |
| Mathlib.Topology.Category.CompactlyGenerated | 1316 | 1320 | +4 (+0.30%) |


<details><summary>Import changes for all files</summary>

|Files|Import difference|
|-|-|
| `Mathlib.Condensed.TopCatAdjunction`|2|
| `Mathlib.Topology.Category.CompactlyGenerated`|4|
| `Mathlib.Topology.Compactness.CompactlyGeneratedSpace`|1317|

</details>

</details>

---

<details><summary>

#### Declarations diff

</summary>

`+ CompactlyGeneratedSpace.isClosed`
`+ CompactlyGeneratedSpace.isClosed'`
`+ CompactlyGeneratedSpace.isOpen`
`+ CompactlyGeneratedSpace.isOpen'`
`+ UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.isClosed`
`+ UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.isOpen`
`+ compactlyGeneratedSpace_of_coinduced`
`+ compactlyGeneratedSpace_of_continuous_maps`
`+ compactlyGeneratedSpace_of_isClosed`
`+ compactlyGeneratedSpace_of_isClosed_of_t2`
`+ compactlyGeneratedSpace_of_isOpen`
`+ compactlyGeneratedSpace_of_isOpen_of_t2`
`+ continuous_from_compactlyGeneratedSpace`
`+ instance (X : Type v) [t : TopologicalSpace X] [DiscreteTopology X] :`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [SequentialSpace X] : UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.{u} X := by`
`+ instance (priority := 100) [WeaklyLocallyCompactSpace X] [T2Space X] :`
`+ instance [UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.{u} X] [UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.{v} Y] :`
`+ instance {S : Setoid X} [UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.{u} X] :`
`+ instance {Î¹ : Type u} {X : Î¹ â†’ Type v}`
`+ instance {Î¹ : Type v} {X : Î¹ â†’ Type w} [âˆ€ i, TopologicalSpace (X i)]`
`+ uCompactlyGeneratedSpace_of_coinduced`
`+ uCompactlyGeneratedSpace_of_isClosed`
`+ uCompactlyGeneratedSpace_of_isOpen`
`- instance (X : Type w) [t : TopologicalSpace X] [DiscreteTopology X] :`
<details>
  <summary>You can run this locally as follows</summary>


```bash
## summary with just the declaration names:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh <optional_commit>

## more verbose report:
./scripts/declarations_diff.sh long <optional_commit>
```
</details>
The doc-module for `script/declarations_diff.sh` contains some details about this script.

</details>

This PR/issue depends on:
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#15201~~
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#15202~~
* ~~leanprover-community/mathlib4#15176~~
By **[Dependent Issues](https://github.com/z0al/dependent-issues)** (ðŸ¤–). Happy coding!
<!-- By Dependent Issues (Action) - DO NOT REMOVE -->

Generalizations to `UCompactlyGeneratedSpace` are quite straightforward. I'm pretty sure they work well for `CompactlyGeneratedSpace`, without having to specialize them. However I think I should still add the specialized versions, because in my view someone who is just interested in topology does not have to know about `UCompactlyGeneratedSpace` nor to care about universes. Is it okay if I do it that way?

To answer your question (if I understand it correctly), yes, it's completely fine and useful to have both the general and specialized version of the theorems when that applies. What I mean is that you can prove theorems for `UCompactlyGeneratedSpace.{u, w}`, and then prove the specialized versions for `CompactlyGeneratedSpace` just by applying the general version with `u = w` (don't duplicate the proof).
Yes, that's what I intended to do. Thanks!

Thanks! 

maintainer merge
ðŸš€ Pull request has been placed on the maintainer queue by dagurtomas.

Thanks!

bors merge

Pull request successfully merged into master.

Build succeeded:
  * [Build](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10195485018/job/28204285327)
  * [Lint style](https://github.com/leanprover-community/mathlib4/actions/runs/10195485018/job/28204285548)

This theorem should hold for more general universes and `UCompactlyGeneratedSpace`Â as well. Could you try to prove it in the proper generality? If it's annoying to apply it (e.g. if Lean can't figure out the universes automatically in the proof of the theorem below), then you can state this special case as well.
I believe this theorem and the instances below are true for `UCompactlyGeneratedSpace`Â with any universe. Could you try to generalise?

The definition of `UCompactlyGeneratedSpace`Â could be moved to this file, along with the part of the API surrounding it that is not specific to the category `CompactlyGenerated`. Then the file `Topology.Category.CompactlyGenerated`Â should import this file.

pullRequest.title: [Merged by Bors] - feat(Topology): add API for compactly generated spaces

source.title: feat: Proper maps and preimage of compact sets
[Merged by Bors] - feat: compactly generated spaces for proper maps and preimages of compact sets / proper and properly discontinuous actions
